test.instr: (:ins (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X blue) (sort Y closet))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X yellow) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X black) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X blue) (sort Y table))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X green))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X worktable))) (:cons_notnot (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X white) (sort Y refrigerator)))) )
test.nl: There is a remotecontrol which is blue on the closet. The door of the cupboard is closed. Put the yellow book on the cupboard. Put a bottle on the cupboard. Put a can which is black in the cupboard. Put a remotecontrol which is blue on the table. Pick up the green cup. Go to the worktable. The white bottle must be in the refrigerator.
